titleStmt.title: The vvay to life and death. Laid down in a sermon, 1629. before the Lord Major of London then being. / By N. Waker M.A. late minister of Jesus Christ at Lawndon in Buckinghamshire. Now published for the reasonableness of the advice therein given, touching the five controverted points, viz. predestination, general redemption, freewill, conversion, and perseverance of the siants. Directing a safe way for the practice of private Christians, as confessed by the disputants on both sides.
titleStmt.author: Waker, Nathaniel.
Waker, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.L. for Phil. Stephens at the gilded Lyon in St. Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the gilded Lyon in St. Pauls Church-yard.
